data.title: Bob Corritore – Official Website
data.meta_description: One of the great personalities of Chicago blues is the unstoppable Tail Dragger, whose charisma fills up any room he plays in. Though considered to be a Howlin' Wolf stylist, Tail Dragger puts his own touch to the proceedings. A regular performer on the West Side of Chicago, Tail Dragger's band has provided work for…
data.text:
One of the great personalities of Chicago blues is the unstoppable Tail Dragger, whose charisma fills up any room he plays in. Though considered to be a Howlin’ Wolf stylist, Tail Dragger puts his own touch to the proceedings. A regular performer on the West Side of Chicago, Tail Dragger’s band has provided work for many great artists, including Eddie Taylor, Jimmy Dawkins, Hubert Sumlin, James Scott, Willie Kent, Tim Taylor, Larry Taylor, Martin Lange, Rockin’ Johnny, Robert Plunkett, Illinois Slim, Scott Dirks, Dave Waldman, and many others. Bob Corritore had the privilege of working with Tail Dragger in the late 1970s and early 1980s. Enjoy these photos of the great Tail Dragger.

Left to right: Big Leon Brooks, Paul Cooper, Willie Williams (drums), Tail Dragger (in overalls), Sylvia Embry. Photo courtesy Paul Cooper.

Tail Dragger in the 1970s! Photo by Hans Ekestang.

Willie Williams, Paul Cooper, Tail Dragger (seated), Sylvia Embry, Big Leon Brooks. Photo courtesy Paul Cooper.

This photo by David Herwalt was made in December 1979 as this crew was converting an old gas station into what would become the Delta Fish Market. L-R unknown, Hubert Sumlin, Tail Dragger, Oliver Davis, Detroit Junior.

Tail Dragger – Delta Fish Market – Early 1980s

Bob Corritore & Boston Blackie in the background

(Photo by Marty Green)

At the Delta Fish Market, summer 1983 with Hester Brooks (widow of Big Leon Brooks), Bob Corritore, Illinois Slim, Tail Dragger, and Hubert Sumlin’s daughter.

Tail Dragger. Photo André Hobus Library courtesy Marc de Jonghe.

Highway Man, Tail Dragger, and Oliver “Fishman” Davis at the Delta Fish Market. Photo by David Herwaldt.

Tail Dragger’s out of focus Leric Records publicity photo from the 1980s!

Tail Dragger, Age 5, in Arkansas

(Photo Courtesy of Tail Dragger & Scott Dirks)

Tail Dragger’s mother, Pearline Jones.

Tail Dragger holding a live fish at the Delta Fish Market. Photo Erik Lindahl.

Eddie Taylor, Mary (proprietor of Mary’s Lounge), Tail Dragger.

Tail Dragger with Martin Lang and Rockin’ Johnny. Photo by Fredrik Gustafson.

Tail Dragger CD / DVD for Delmark: My Head Is Bald

Recorded Live at Vern’s Friendly Lounge in Chicago

Tail Dragger at Delmark Studios with Willie Young, Illinois Slim, and Sam Lay. Photo courtesy Illinois Slim.

Bob Corritore, Rockin’ Johnny, Kenny Smith, Tail Dragger, Sho Komiya at the Delmark Brunch, Chicago. Photo Jennifer Noble.

Tail Dragger entertain the people at the 2011 Waterfront Blues Festival in Portland, Oregon. Photo by Marilyn Stringer.

Photo by Dave Blake

Tail Dragger at the Rhythm Room. Photo Dave Blake.

Bob Corritore and Tail Dragger backstage at the 2011 Chicago Blues Festival. Photo by Daniel Swadener.

Tail Dragger at Chicago Blues Festival. Photo by Jennifer Noble.

Tail Dragger in the hospitality room of the Windy City Blues Festival. Photo Bob Corritore.

Henry Gray and Tail Dragger signing CDs at the 2011 Lucerne Blues Festival, Switzerland. Photo by Bob Corritore.

Tail Dragger and his wife Bertha at the 2011 Lucerne Blues Festival in Switzerland. Photo Bob Corritore.

Tail Dragger, Bob Corritore, Rodney Brown, Lucerne Blues Festival, Switzerland, 2011.

Tail Dragger

Photo by Robert Pasenko.

Tail Dragger and Bob Corritore in Helsinki, Finland 2012 by Pertti Nurmi.

Tail Dragger in Boquete, Panama, 2013. Photo by Bob Corritore.

Bob Corritore and Tail Dragger at the 2013 Boquete Blues & Jazz Festival, Boquete, Panama.

Bob Corritore, Henry Gray, Tail Dragger backstage before their show at the Pocas Y Jazz Festival, Pocas de Caldes, Brazil.

Tail Dragger and Bob Corritore at Stadsschouwburg Theatre, Bruges, Belgium, 2013. Photo by Franky Bruneel.

Eddie Taylor Jr., Henry Gray (seated), Bob Corritore, Tail Dragger (seated), Rockin’ Johnny, Illinois Slim, Bob Stroger (seated), Brian Fahey. Photo by Marilyn Stringer.

Tail Dragger crawling on the floor at the Rhythm Room! Photo by Marilyn Stringer.

Tail Dragger at the Hondarribia Blues Festival in Spain.

Bob Corritore, Tail Dragger, Rockin’ Johnny, Illinois Slim, 2016 Chicago Blues Festival.

Bob Corritore, Tail Dragger, Johnny Burgin at the 2017 Chicago Blues Festival. Photo by Marilyn Stringer.

Tail Dragger and Bob Corritore at Reggie’s, Chicago

Tail Dragger taking a session smoke break at Tempest Recording. Photo by Drew Verbis.

Tail Dragger photo by Bob O Walesa, 2019.

Bob Corritore and Tail Dragger performing in Brazil.

Bob Corritore and Tail Dragger performing in Brazil.

Performing at the Hnita Jazz Club in Belgium. L-R: Bob Corritore, Jimi Primetime, Smith, Tail Dragger, Yahni Riley, Johnny Burgin (obscured)

Tail Dragger being interviewed in Portugal. Photo courtesy BB Blues Festival.

Tail Dragger and Robbert Fossen at 2023 Moulin Blues Festival, Netherlands.

Tail Dragger with Bob Corritore at the 2023 Willow Springs Blues Festival. Photo Sandra Lee.

Tail Dragger and Billy Branch. Photo courtesy of Billy Branch.

Tail Dragger and his wife Bertha in front of Jazz Record Mart, Chicago. Photo by Bob Corritore.
